name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Awesome New Tab - Keep Calm and Keep Learning

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open your new tab with a message that motivates you to learn!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is just a minimal new tab. I did not want a blank screen so I made a small page to motivate me to learn new things everyday. I'm a Hakkar BTW.
